per_frame_1=chng=sin(time*.5);
per_frame_2=cthr=.9999;
per_frame_3=mq21=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(3),mq21);
per_frame_4=mq22=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(3),mq22);
per_frame_5=mq23=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(3),mq23);
per_frame_6=mq24=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(2),mq24);
per_frame_7=mq25=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(2),mq25);
per_frame_8=mq26=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(2),mq26);
per_frame_9=mq27=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(1),mq27);
per_frame_10=mq28=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(1),mq28);
per_frame_11=mq29=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(1)*.3,mq29);
per_frame_12=mq31=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(1)*.3,mq31);
per_frame_13=monitor=chng;
per_frame_14=q21=mq21;q22=mq22;q23=mq23;q24=mq24;q25=mq25;q26=mq26;
per_frame_15=q27=mq27;q28=mq28;q29=mq29;q31=mq31;
per_frame_16=
per_frame_17=monitor=mq1;
per_frame_18=vol=bass+treb+mid;
per_frame_19=atime=atime+vol;
per_frame_20=q11=.4+sin(atime*.006        )*.4;
per_frame_21=q12=.4+cos(atime*.00613828348)*.4;
per_frame_22=q13=.4+sin(atime*.00598593455)*.4;
per_frame_23=monitor=q13;
per_frame_24=wave_r = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(6*time);
per_frame_25=wave_g = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(4.1*time);
per_frame_26=wave_b = -1 + (1-wave_r + 1-wave_g);
per_frame_27=warp = 0;
per_frame_28=//echo_zoom = echo_zoom + 0.2*sin(bass_att);
per_frame_29=vol2=bass+mid+treb;
per_frame_30=q30=vol2*4;
per_frame_31=q3=vol2*4;
per_pixel_1=w= -time*0.4; // direction (0: left; asin(1): top; (+/-)2*asin(1): right; -asin(1): bottom)
per_pixel_2=
per_pixel_3=X2 = x-0.5; // needed to rotate around center
per_pixel_4=Y2 = y-0.5; // (if you add a strong shift, it may appear not turning around the center, but find out yourself)
per_pixel_5=
per_pixel_6=X1 = sin(w)*X2 -cos(w)*Y2; // these 2 lines first rotate the x/y pane
per_pixel_7=Y1 = cos(w)*X2 +sin(w)*Y2;
per_pixel_8=
per_pixel_9=x = X1; // so you can use x and y as usually below
per_pixel_10=y = Y1;
per_pixel_11=
per_pixel_12=rad = sqrt(x*x + y*y)*2; // had to replace rad and ang, because of the translation by -.5,-.5
per_pixel_13=ang = atan2(x,y);
per_pixel_14=
per_pixel_15=dx1=-0.05*sin(1.15+(rad*2-1)*5)+mid/999; // hey this is your code! ;-)
per_pixel_16=dy1=-0.05*sin(1.+(ang*2-1)*1);
per_pixel_17=
per_pixel_18=dx2 = sin(-w)*dx1 - cos(-w)*dy1; // and finally the dx/dy pane is rotated to match the x/y pane
per_pixel_19=dy2 = cos(-w)*dx1 + sin(-w)*dy1;
per_pixel_20=
per_pixel_21=dx = dx2;
per_pixel_22=dy = dy2;
per_pixel_23=
per_pixel_24=
per_pixel_25=
per_pixel_26=
per_pixel_27=
per_pixel_28=zoom=1555+sin(time/20) *150;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    // sample previous frame
warp_4=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_5=`
warp_6=`    // feather pen
warp_7=`    ret = max(ret, tex2D( sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*(1-3*length(texsize.zw)) + 0.5 ).xyz);
warp_8=`float4 noise9 = tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, 
warp_9=`                      ((uv.xyy*q27
warp_10=`                       )*texsize.xyy*texsize_noisevol_hq.zww
warp_11=`                      ).xyz*
warp_12=`                      float3(1,1,0)*0.05 + 
warp_13=`                      time*float3(0,0,1)*q29
warp_14=`                     );
warp_15=`if(ret.x> q21*q13         && ret.x<= q24*q11        )ret.y -= (noise9).x*.5; 
warp_16=`if(ret.y> q22*q11         && ret.y<= q25*q12        )ret.z -= (noise9).y*.5; 
warp_17=`if(ret.z> q23*q12         && ret.z<= q26*q13        )ret.x -= (noise9).z*.5; 
warp_18=`    ret = max(ret, tex2D( sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*(1+3*length(texsize.zw)) + 0.5 ).xyz);
warp_19=`
warp_20=`    // darken over time
warp_21=`    ret -= 0.02;
warp_22=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    uv *= 0.5;
comp_4=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz;
comp_5=`    ret = max(ret, tex2D(sampler_main,uv + float2(0.5,0)).xyz);
comp_6=`    ret = max(ret, tex2D(sampler_main,uv + float2(0,0.5)).xyz);
comp_7=`float4 noise9 = tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, 
comp_8=`                      ((uv.xyy*q28
comp_9=`                       )*texsize.xyy*texsize_noisevol_hq.zww
comp_10=`                      ).xyz*
comp_11=`                      float3(1,1,0)*0.05 + 
comp_12=`                      time*float3(0,0,1)*q31
comp_13=`                     );
comp_14=`if(ret.x> q26*q13         && ret.x<= q23*q11        )ret.z -= (noise9).x*.5; 
comp_15=`if(ret.y> q25*q11         && ret.y<= q22*q12        )ret.x -= (noise9).y*.5; 
comp_16=`if(ret.z> q24*q12         && ret.z<= q21*q13        )ret.y -= (noise9).z*.5; 
comp_17=`    ret = max(ret, tex2D(sampler_main,uv + float2(0.5,0.5)).xyz);
comp_18=`    ret *= 1.3; // a little bit of overbright
comp_19=`ret=.6-ret;
comp_20=`}
